description: Mishe mokwa trail to Sandstone peak
directions: From Santa Monica, take the Pacific Coast Highway north for about 29 miles and take a right onto Yerba Buena Road. Continue east for 6.4 miles and a dirt parking area will be on the left side of the road, just after a sharp bend. If the trailhead is full, there is an overflow lot 0.6 mile to the east of the main lot with a connection to the Backbone Trail.
title: Sandstone peak
